General.Name: Shanghai Aiyingshi Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Aiyingshi Co.,Ltd provides maternal and child products in China. The company's products include infant dairy products, feeding supplies, toiletries, cotton textiles, paper products, toys, lathes, and other products. It operates stores in Shanghai, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Fujian, Chongqing, and Shenzhen. The company also sells its products through an online platform. Shanghai Aiyingshi Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
